Question: CYTENA Bioprocess Solutions Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
CYTENA Bioprocess Solutions Co., Ltd

Product: S.NEST™ High-throughput Microbioreactor

- Revolutionary high-throughput microbioreactor with real-time dissolved oxygen (DO) and pH monitoring
- Patented reciprocating mixing technology for optimal cell growth in suspension cultures
- Compatible with four 96-well or 24-well culture plates, enabling high cell cultivation
- Individual environmental settings in incubation chambers
- Software transforms monitored data into valuable research insights
- Aims to reduce organ shortage and accelerate drug development by providing accessible life science solutions combining biology and technology
Summary_cn:
CYTENA生物工艺解决方案有限公司

产品：S.NEST™高通量微生物反应器

- 革命性的高通量微生物反应器，具有实时溶解氧（DO）和pH监测功能
- 采用专利往复搅拌技术，以优化悬浮细胞培养中的细胞生长
- 兼容四个96孔或24孔培养板，可实现高细胞培养
- 孵育室具有个体化环境设置功能
- 软件将监测数据转化为宝贵的研究洞察力
- 旨在通过提供结合生物学和技术的易于获取的生命科学解决方案来减少器官短缺和加快药物研发进程
